channel.title: Good home location
channel.description: Alright guys well I'm not sure which home to use for my server currently, i don't want to place npcs globally just yet as the player base would be quite small when we start but later on as we grow i'll start to place npcs and objects globally so what do you guys think is the best home?

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:23, topic:472314”]This is my first serious comment in a while; I don’t think the home area is as important as people claim it to be. Yes, it’s the first area you see whilst logging in (usually) but it shouldn’t sway your opinion on the server as a whole. I don’t know about you all, but when I play a server I look for unique content, such as mini-games, quests, etc. I don’t care if the home area is so-called beautiful, I play a server to find new and fun things to do, not sit at the home area.

Point being; You should focus on content, after getting everything where you want it, it is then you can focus on areas such as the home.[/quote]

I’am working on content, I made this poll to find out which home location people like the most so that once im done the content I can change the home.

Read full topic

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

I don’t know about you all, but when I play a server I look for unique content, such as mini-games, quests, etc. I don’t care if the home area is so-called beautiful, I play a server to find new and fun things to do, not sit at the home area.

Point being; You should focus on content, after getting everything where you want it, it is then you can focus on areas such as the home.[/quote]

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

This is my first serious comment in a while; I don’t think the home area is as important as people claim it to be. Yes, it’s the first area you see whilst logging in (usually) but it shouldn’t sway your opinion on the server as a whole. I don’t know about you all, but when I play a server I look for unique content, such as mini-games, quests, etc. I don’t care if the home area is so-called beautiful, I play a server to find new and fun things to do, not sit at the home area.

Point being; You should focus on content, after getting everything where you want it, it is then you can focus on areas such as the home.

Read full topic

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:21, topic:472314”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=590061.msg4178075#msg4178075 date=1355196033]

This is one of the main reasons your servers never take off. Quit focusing so much on the home and more on everything else.

Who said he wasn’t focusing as much, or even more on anything else?
[/quote]

I played his server for 6 months. In that time, he changed home from Draynor, to Shilo, back to Draynor, then he started switching things to Al-Kharid, then moved it to Varrock. That’s when I realized he’s not working on any ‘real’ content and stopped playing.[/quote]

We did many updates and the reason why we changed the home so often was because the player base was increasing and decreasing and the reason why I made this poll was to find out which home people like the most other then edgeville

Read full topic

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:17, topic:472314”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=590061.msg4178071#msg4178071 date=1355195597]
This is one of the main reasons your servers never take off. Quit focusing so much on the home and more on everything else.
[/quote]
Who said he wasn’t focusing as much, or even more on anything else?[/quote]

I played his server for 6 months. In that time, he changed home from Draynor, to Shilo, back to Draynor, then he started switching things to Al-Kharid, then moved it to Varrock. That’s when I realized he’s not working on any ‘real’ content and stopped playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Shilo is a nice little town. Lumbridge makes me feel like I just lost stuff and have to start over/re-do everything… because when whips were 4m in 2009 I think, I went in to do the lost tribe quest and blah whatever I died and lost my bank (~15m not botted/purchased). Maybe other people feel the same way towards lumbridge.

Read full topic

item.title: Good home location
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Ruby:

I’d go with Yanille, loved that as home. I also had Al Kharid back in the day, it’s awkward to do but it worked brilliantly.

Yes there are little homes for 1 npc rooms for shops so it’s widely spread out instead of being a bunch of lined up NPC’s. I would use al kharid for my home, but I don’t like the desert theme. I would make the shops there but I don’t understand why they can’t just be at spawn, so I put them at spawn (stupid near reality is what I’m referring too).

Read full topic
